name: Cued Speech coding
descr: Generates cued speech key codes from phonemes and optionally tags a video. This automatic annotation is currently under development. It mustn't be used for any final application except to test it in order to contribute. Requires time-aligned phonemes.

options.text: Pattern of the file with time-aligned phonemes
Pattern of the file with sights of the face of the person
Version of the system to estimate hand transition moments (0-5).
Version of the system to estimate hand angle (0-3).
Version of the system to estimate vowel positions around the face (0-3).
Tag a video with keys. Requires a video and sights.
A hands set to tag the video (default: none). One of: drawcue, drawccue, brigitte, fred, laurent, axel, lise, fidelia.
A filter to apply on hands. One of: cartoon, sights, skeleton, tgtline or sticks.
The angle of the hand is corrected by the one of the face.
Add textual information at the top left corner on the video.
Draw circle at the vowel' positions on the video.
